name: The Konia Project
overview: The Konia project is a game for C64 where you can play 3 games "inside" a Nok... ehm, an old "Konia" cellphone, while funny text messages entertain you. Hitting spacebar in-game makes you warp in the "crazy mode", where a game switches to another game suddenly. Hitting spacebar during the menu choice picks a random chat to show. Can you reach 255 points and break the "indestructible" phone?
